title: Secret Identities
description: Sofia likes a boy. (Which is a bigger deal than you’d think.) Sofia likes a boy named Roy Grant. (Who is super cute, which is also a big deal.) Roy Grant is the Champ, and he likes her back. (Majorly big deal.) The only problem is, “Roy” Grant doesn’t exist. Roxanne Grant isn’t totally sure who she is, but she knows one thing: she’s head over heels for a girl named Sofia.One-Shot/Rated T+
author: Kitty Burroughs
